member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_BOUNDARY_TABLE
member.summary: The MIB_IPMCAST_BOUNDARY_TABLE structure contains a list of a router's scoped IPv4 multicast address boundaries.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_BOUNDARY_TABLE.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of structures listed in table[].

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_BOUNDARY_TABLE.table
member.summary: An array of structures which collectively define the set of scoped IPv4 multicast address boundaries on a router.
